scriptedEmail.name: Thread Split
scriptedEmail.description: Sends an email to a reply author when their reply is split into a separate thread.
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body">Your reply to {from_thread_link} has been moved to its own thread: {to_thread_link}</resource> <resource name="Subject">Your reply was moved to a separate thread</resource> <resource name="Header">Your reply was moved to a separate thread</resource> </language>
